segments.text: Mary , I will have an interview tomorrow . I am so excited !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Congratulations ! By the way , have you had all the things ready for the interview ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I only typed several copies of my resume .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's not enough . You have many other things to prepare .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Besides the resume , you also need the original and copies of your graduation certificate and your ID card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Also several copies of your one-inch color photos .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You also need to prepare formal clothes for the interview ; a suit should be the best .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have a briefcase ready with all your interview materials in it for easy carrying .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All these should be enough . Good luck !
segments.speaker: S2
